articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Taken with Chiefs of Branch Social Security Stations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Taken with Chiefs of Branch Social Security Stations
						
Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, had a photo session with the participants in the national meeting of chiefs of branch social security stations. 
					Kim Jong Un warmly congratulated the participants in the national meeting and all the people's security personnel who have devotedly worked for the party and the leader, the country and its people on an invisible front, waging a war without gun report against the enemies of the revolution making desperate efforts to bring down Korean-style socialism. 
					
					He had a photo taken with the participants in the national meeting after highly praising them for having safeguarded the lifeline of the Juche-oriented revolution and reliably defended the outpost of class struggle under the uplifted banner of devotedly defending the leader in the glorious and trying days under the leadership of the party.
					
					He expressed expectation and belief that all the people's security personnel and officers and men of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces would creditably fulfill their honorable mission and duty as the revolutionary armed forces of our party and the internal security forces of the Supreme Commander. 
					
					Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Ki Nam, Ri Myong Su and Ri Pyong Sam.
